div.div: Can run 2 threads, but they compete for the same resources

switch.text: Can run 2 threads, but they compete...

stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.div: The process that creates another process

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(250, 104, 0), rgb(233, 107, 18)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(199, 53, 0), rgb(255, 145, 100));

path.style: stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); animation: 500ms linear 0s infinite normal none running ge-flow-animation-md71VLoXy4UKwHA2ZLbK; stroke-dashoffset: 16;
